page.title: 04St. Martin's Church
page.content: St Martin's Church is one of the oldest buildings in our block.It was built in the Norman times.The first vicar of St Martin's Church was Elias De Coleshull in 1325.In the year 1348 there were four vicars because of the BLACK DEATH.The vicar now has been vicar of St Martin's Church from 1978. His name is Rev Dudley J Ractliffe. The inside of the church is XV century and made in Caen stone.The Miserere seats were brought from Woodspring Priory. The altar is the most sacred part of the church.The oldest grave says : MARIADUN AGE 104 10 JULY 1644. It has a whole family in it .St Martin's Church has six bells.
